transcription.text: Over 20 years since Wheatus released their song ‘Teenage Dirtbag’ its nostalgic allure is still as potent as ever. The “Teenage dirtbag” challenge has been popularised by users and celebrities alike, including Paris Hilton, Christina Aguilera and Tara Reid. Compiling photos from adolescence in the early 2000s to the Wheatus song. Think emo, MySpace, American Pie and of course Paris Hilton. Like most viral trends there has been a divide between younger Gen Z and the Millennials who were actually around for the period dubbed “Indie Sleeze”.
